identity.title: We believe in Plant energy
identity.description:
We focus on the incredible power of plants.
We seek safe and effective ingredients from nature.

Plenty Plant (Plenty + Plant) represents the abundance of plants around us,
conveying the idea that plants are sufficient just as they are.
By using plant-based ingredients, we strive to capture nature’s essence with honesty and purity.
Our brand embodies our philosophy—promoting healthy beauty while respecting all life on Earth.

identity.title: OUR Mission, Original
identity.description:
The Full Benefits of Plants, Delivered to Your Skin.

Our research began with skepticism toward the most commonly used plant-based ingredients.
While plant extracts have become a staple in cosmetics, many products rely on low-concentration extracts that are barely different from water.

That’s why we sought to harness the full energy of plants for the skin.
By exploring and studying various plant-derived ingredients, we have developed products that are both effective and true to nature.

Through us, the pure energy of plants will be fully absorbed into your skin.

identity.title: WHAT YOU WANT, DEWDAP
identity.description:
DEWDAP is a mindful beauty vegan brand dedicated to providing precious healing moments even in the busy daily lives of modern society. 
DEWDAP aims to embark on a journey to make your dry skin and weary mind hydrated and filled with confidence.
 Not solely on external beauty, but also on achieving inner balance and tranquility. 
Our skincare routine, infused with optimal ingredients and high-quality standards, 
offers refreshment in the morning and serenity in the evening, cherishing every moment of your day.
 Gift yourself a moment of rest with DEWDAP therapy.

identity.title: HIGH SENSITIVITY QUALITY
identity.description: Dewdap develops high-quality products with scientifically proven optimal ingredients. Also, Dewdap develops eco-friendly products for a sustainable life in harmony with the Earth and is a vegan brand that does not use animal-derived ingredients.

identity.title: Discovering Skin Solutions with Finest Ingredient
identity.description:
WOLLYO is committed to branding high-performance skincare and body care products by incorporating only the safest and most effective ingredients. Every product undergoes 100% dermatological testing through accredited clinical trials to ensure proven efficacy and outstanding results.

We are actively promoting and selling our products on Korea’s major online platforms, including Naver, Coupang, Musinsa Beauty etc. Additionally, Wollyo also extends to international markets, including Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, and Vietnam,

data.name: EcoBe
data.slogun: Save your skin Save the lives

identity.title: Alongside Nature
identity.description:
🟢 EcoBe is a compound word dervied from Eco and Be’.

 🟢 As a leader in Korean vegan beauty, EcoBe is dedicated to promoting an eco-friendly lifestyle and researching natural ingredients for healthy skin.

 🟢 EcoBe is committed to making gentle skincare products with natural ingredients suitable for all skin types, and promote an eco-friendly lifestyle.

 🟢 Through this journey, EcoBe contributes to the healthy coexistence of humans and nature.

identity.title: Korean No.1 Vegan Beauty
identity.description:
✔️ VEGAN FORMULA
100% vegan formula without animal-derived ingredients.
No animal testing for a beautiful life coexistence.

 ✔️ INGREDIENT
Made with EWG green grade ingredients to be safe for all skin types.

 ✔️ NATURAL ORIGIN
Made with natural ingredients, free from over 10 harmful chemicals and artificial fragrances.

 ✔️ ECO-PACKAGING
Actively embraces an eco-friendly packaging process by utilizing soy ink printing and FSC certified recycled paper packaging to support environmental sustainability.

identity.title: Human Like Low molecular Collagen Aesthetics
identity.description: matrifeelgen offers feel-off masks, ampoules, and special care packages containing collagen with a structure 97% similar to human skin.

identity.title: Medical Skin Science, Collagen That My Skin Rememb
identity.description:
Its not just about supplementing collagen it must be replenished in the way that skin cells remember.

MATRIGEN’s Medical Skin Science researches collagen that functions in the same way as the skin itself, providing regenerative solutions that work just like real collagen within the skin.

identity.title: Body Home Therapy with a Subtle Scent
identity.description: Indulge in a luxurious body home therapy experience with a subtle, comforting scent. The rich, moisturizing melting butter texture deeply nourishes the skin without leaving a sticky residue. Infused with powerful anti-aging and exfoliating ingredients, it helps enhance skin elasticity while refining texture for irresistibly soft and smooth skin.

identity.title: Rediscover Your Skin’s Natural Beauty
identity.description: Experience the power of premium bio-cellulose sheet masks, designed to deliver deep nourishment into the skin. Infused with potent ingredients, it helps restore hydration and enhance your skin’s natural radiance. Reveal a healthier, more luminous complexion with LA MUSE, where beauty begins from within.

data.name: LOMERE
data.slogun: Love the care Shine every moment

identity.title: Truffle-infused radiance & antioxidants
identity.description:
LOMERE’s Truffle Skincare Line harnesses the power of truffle extract, renowned for its brightening and antioxidant benefits, to nourish, protect, and revitalize the skin for a radiant, youthful glow.

Rich in antioxidants, truffle extract helps fight free radicals, slow signs of aging, and improve skin tone and elasticity, making it an essential part of any skincare routine.

LOMERE’s Truffle Skincare Line ensures luxurious, effective care, keeping skin radiant, youthful, and deeply nourished every day.

identity.title: enhances hydration and skin barrier health
identity.description: Formulated with thermal water, panthenol, centella asiatica extract, and eight types of hyaluronic acid, this line deeply hydrates the skin and improves the skin barrier. It also effectively soothes sensitive skin, providing lasting moisture and strengthening the skin’s natural defenses

identity.title: Ingredients from Italian Nature
identity.description:
The finest quality ingredients sourced from Italys pristine nature,
and cosmetic products crafted with artistic inspiration and exceptional quality

These are the highest praises that VANELLY, the Italian classic cosmetic brand offers to you.

identity.title: PREMIUM BOUTIQUE
identity.description:
Vanelly is distributed through premium channels and its own online boutique to maximize the value consumers experience at the moment of purchase.
It has been made available through Korea’s leading department stores such as Shinsegae, Lotte, Hyundai, and Galleria.

identity.title: Skin science from pharmaceutical technology
identity.description: At Dear Lauren, we are dedicated to delivering the ultimate in scientific skincare. Our products are meticulously crafted using advanced, scientifically refined ingredients to ensure high efficacy, minimal allergic reactions, and low toxicity. Through rigorous research and innovation, we provide highly effective skincare solutions that prioritize your skins health and beauty.

identity.title: A Fathers Quest for His Daughter
identity.description: Laurens story begins in New Jersey and takes a dramatic turn when her family relocates to South Korea. At just three years old, Lauren was exposed to toxic chemicals from epoxy work in an apartment parking lot, triggering a severe case of eczema. Determined to find a cure, her father tried every recommended moisturizer, facing disappointment at every turn. Refusing to resort to steroid treatments due to their risks, he embarked on a relentless quest for a solution, laying the foundation for what would become Dear Lauren.

data.name: MILLAC
data.slogun: The New Standard of Inner Care

identity.title: Your Confidence Begins Within – MILLAC Inner Care
identity.description:
MILLAC is an inner care brand for those who value self-care and confidence. Founded by a female entrepreneur, MILLAC was created to address real personal care concerns from the customer’s perspective. We believe that confidence starts with healthy habits and that intimate wellness is essential for overall well-being.

With a focus on safety and effectiveness, MILLAC develops high-quality inner care solutions. Every product undergoes strict hygiene and quality control, ensuring trust and reliability. Our mission is to help individuals feel comfortable, confident, and empowered through self-care

identity.title: Supporting a Healthier, More Confident You
identity.description:
MILLAC believes self-care goes beyond products—it’s about daily habits. That’s why we launched the Healthy Habits Campaign, encouraging small yet meaningful actions for better intimate wellness and self-care.

Through this campaign, we emphasize that consistent care leads to greater confidence and a better quality of life. MILLAC not only provides trusted products but also inspires a self-care mindset. We are here to support a healthier, more confident you, every step of the way.

identity.description: This is a history of receiving certificates awarded to brands with high recognition, product capability, and sales volume.

identity.title: VIVAKOREA patents and certifications prove safety

The company has successfully completed Dermatest in Germany, the Vegan Test in the UK, and the Functional Cosmetics Certification Test in South Korea, proving the safety, efficacy, and environmental friendliness of its products.

CMDE KOREA is a specialized manufacturer of cosmetics and chemical products (including cosmetic raw materials).
Based on our proprietary technology and systematic production system,
CMDE KOREA produces and sells cosmetics and beauty adhesives.

As both a manufacturer and a responsible seller,
CMDE KOREA directly manages the entire process—from R&D, production, and logistics to marketing—through a team of experts, ensuring exceptional product quality.

CMDE KOREA will continue striving to develop and manufacture high-quality products.

data.name: DrReborn
data.slogun: Real Beauty Health Backed by Medical

identity.title: Dr. Reborn
identity.description:
Dr. Reborn is a beauty & health brand personally researched, developed, and managed by Dr. Sodam Jung. Beyond simply launching products, the brand is built on medical expertise, undergoing rigorous research to provide reliable skincare and healthcare solutions.

As an influencer with over 100,000 followers, Dr. Jung not only develops products but also directly communicates with customers, leading marketing and promotions herself. This hands-on approach allows her to quickly respond to consumer needs and offer customized solutions for real skin concerns.

identity.title: by Dr. Sodam Jung
identity.description:
Rapidly growing in South Korea, Dr. Reborn is particularly gaining global attention for its exosome skincare line. With increasing international demand, the brand is making strides toward becoming a world-renowned beauty brand beyond its domestic success.

A brand that merges professional knowledge with customer-driven communication—experience Dr. Reborn, the ultimate solution crafted by a doctor.

LUSIS places the inherent value of hair and authentic beauty above all else.
Born from exceptional hair care ingredients and the expertise of professionals, LUSIS stands out among countless products with its unrivaled technology.
1st Step – Deep cleansing with hair-loss relieving LUSIS Crystal Shampoo
2nd Step – Nourishing care with hair LUSIS Crystal Treatment
3rd Step – Repair and protection with leave-in LUSIS Crystal Hair pack
4th Step – Finishing your hairstyle with LUSIS Crystal Essence

data.name: Equlib
data.slogun: Bring balance back into your life

identity.title: Bring balance back into your life with Equlib
identity.description:
At Equlib, we believe in balance – its even in our name, inspired by the French word équilibre. We create skincare that gives you room to breathe and focus on yourself in todays busy world. 
Our approach is simple, built on four key ideas: Balance, Stability, Satisfaction, and Sustainability. Using these principles as our guide, we carefully select effective, reliable ingredients that bring out your skins natural glow.
Our mission? To create skincare that fits naturally into your life while sharing our vision of balanced living – the Equlib way.

identity.title: Bring balance back into your life, Equlib
identity.description:
Balanced skin glows from within. Designed to nourish and hydrate at the core, the EAU BRILLER collection promises a luminous and glowing complexion. Embrace the glow of health and radiance with every product in this collection.

Experience the bliss of balanced hydration.
A skincare series dedicated to calming and deeply moisturizing your skin - The EAU CALM collection is expertly formulated to soothe your complexion while infusing it with essential hydration.

identity.title: ROBLUE Mildly Acidic Scalp Soothing Perfume Shampo
identity.description:
professional: Fragrances created by professional perfumers are often part of the premium lines of luxury brands, and the quality and longevity of the scent is outstanding.

Naturally derived extract: By minimizing chemical ingredients and using natural and safe ingredients instead, it has a gentle and healthy effect on the hair and scalp.

slightly acidic: Typically, the pH of your scalp is around 4.5 to 5.5, and maintaining this pH range is important to maintain the health of your scalp and hair.

identity.title: Kinel Premium Daily Sun Cream
identity.description:
Ask your skin directly.
Kinel, ask the skin directly.

Contains various elastic moisturizing ingredients and functional ingredients
Provides sufficient nutrition to the skin for healthy skin
It helps you to be reborn.

Skin care improves self-esteem and confidence. Well-maintained skin helps you maintain a positive self-image of yourself.

identity.title: “Luxury Fragrance, Everyday Touch” - ARTOIS
identity.description:
Fragrance is the most delicate form of self-expression.
The scent you choose reflects your mood, your atmosphere, and even your emotions. At Artois, we believe in the transformative power of fragrance.

A scent ritual that embraces your emotions.
Artois offers more than just fragrance — we create daily rituals that carry emotion and memory. Each of our body lotions, washes, and hair care products is crafted with unique scent concepts and infused with premium perfume-grade ingredients, leaving a rich and lasting impression on the skin.

One touch, three layers of fragrance.
Every product reveal

identity.title: BLINKLABS Global Commerce Startup Leading Beauty
identity.description:
BLINKLABS
is a global commerce startup with the ambition to lead the global skincare market.

We pursue both innovation and beauty,
creating and developing skincare brands that harmonize emotion and functionality.

Our flagship brand, MEMINE,
is built on the pillars of authenticity, sustainability, and creativity,
offering solutions for those who believe in their own unique beauty.

With a deep understanding of quality, transparency, and consumer needs,
we are committed to building trustworthy partnerships across the world.

“We move with innovation, are inspired by beauty, and create for the

identity.title: Be radiant, Be you(MEMINE)
identity.description:
MEMINE is a skincare brand rooted in the philosophy of revealing your skin’s natural radiance.
Under the slogan “Be radiant, Be you,” we offer products formulated to enhance the skin’s glow through light yet deeply effective formulas.

We focus on clean formulations with natural-derived and highly concentrated ingredients that are safe even for sensitive skin.
Designed to be both simple and effective, MEMINE caters to the modern consumer who values a quick yet high-performing skincare routine.

MEMINE goes beyond skincare — we deliver uplifting, everyday rituals that create lasting beauty habi

identity.title: Functional Vegan
identity.description:
Herbloom is a Functional Vegan Skincare brand based on plant-derived ingredients for balanced and healthy skin. A compound word of Herb and Bloom that means to present healthy beauty and vitality to everyday life, just like a flower in full bloom with healthy plant-derived ingredients grown in good soil.

[Kombucha Skincare]
We own a patented Kombucha ingredient developed in-house. Kombucha contains more than four times the polyphenols of green tea and is rich in amino acids, known as natural moisturizing factors, making it excellent for hydration.

identity.title: Sustainability/Innovative/Safe
identity.description:
Herbloom presents healthy beauty and vitality to everyday life by strengthening skin itself, instead of immediate and temporary effects from chemicals. It’s a healthy choice that begins with a small part of everyday life for you, animals and the environment.

[20 Harmful Ingredients Free / Paper Package/Patent Ingredients]
We incorporate patented plant-based collagen and bakuchiol ingredients, utilizing innovative raw materials and technology to develop highly functional products without harmful substances. Our products benefit both your skin and the environment.

identity.title: No.1 causes of hair loss is immunity and stress
identity.description:
We focus on Acquired hair loss because it has various causes, requiring a more delicate solution. We define the causes of acquired hair loss as aging, weakened immune system, nutritional deficiencies, stress, and digestive issues, and we research formulas tailored to each of them.

No.1 causes of acquired hair loss is weakened immunity and stress. Matsutake strengthens the immunity of the scalp and hair, and give elastic and radiant energy.

* Contains Vitamin B, Beta-glucan, and Amino acids
* Virus/allergy prevention
* Antioxidant
* Enhanced internal immunity

identity.title: See and feel the proven before & after results!
identity.description:
Our top priority is understanding the root causes of hair loss and developing targeted solutions. Among the various factors contributing to hair loss, we particularly focus on stress and immunity, dedicating ourselves to discovering natural ingredients that address these concerns.

Hair is an essential part of ones identity. Having experienced the emotional challenges of hair loss myself, I deeply empathize with those facing similar struggles. Thats why at Morethan8, we are committed to providing everyone with the clearest and most precise path to healthy,

identity.title: A Sister’s Love Meets a Pharmacist’s Science
identity.description: Suffering from severe alopecia areata, an older sister struggled with confidence and daily stress. Seeing her pain, her younger sister, a pharmacist, developed a scientifically formulated solution focused on immunity and stress relief. Through this formula, the sister regained not only her hair but also her confidence. Inspired by this journey, we created a brand that understands the real struggles of hair loss and provides effective, science-backed solutions for women.

identity.title: Awaken your innate desire for beauty.
identity.description: The name “Deepondé” is derived from the two English words “Deep” and “Ponder.” It embodies our brand’s philosophy of deeply contemplating and researching what the skin truly needs. We are committed to developing formulas that are neither excessive nor insufficient, but thoughtfully crafted to deliver real results that build up day by day. Each ingredient is carefully selected and harmoniously blended to suit your skin perfectly bringing lasting benefits that reach deep within.

identity.title: Slowly but Surely
identity.description: At Deepondé, we believe that true beauty should go beyond the skin it should be sustainable in the world around us. That’s why we carefully select our ingredients and packaging with both efficacy and environmental responsibility in mind. For us, sustainable beauty is not a trend, but a standard we uphold in everything we do.

identity.title: ORGANIC CLEAN BEAUTY
identity.description:
SKANSKIN strives for healthy beauty. 
We take the lead for a more beautiful planet and a sustainable future.

By using safe, natural ingredients and sustainable packaging,
we promise to contribute to a healthier life for all through our efforts for positive change.

We are leading the way in eco-friendly living for sustainable well-being.

Using ingredients sourced sustainably from the great nature of Northern Europe,
we develop sustainable packaging and designs,
practicing small but meaningful efforts throughout the entire product journey.

identity.title: Premium boutiques
identity.description:
SKANSKIN is distributed through premium channels and its own online boutique to maximize the value consumers experience at the moment of purchase.

It has been made available through Korea’s leading department stores such as Shinsegae, Lotte, Hyundai, and Galleria. Also showcases its value to global consumers through Korea’s top duty-free shops—Shilla, Lotte, Hyundai, and Shinsegae—offering an unparalleled shopping experience.

identity.title: Reclaim Your Skin’s Natural Health
identity.description: At the heart of our brand lies a commitment to restoring the skins natural health by blending the pure power of nature with cutting-edge scientific innovation. Through the timeless art of fermentation, we unlock concentrated, nutrient-rich ingredients that promote skin regeneration, helping it restore its innate functions and defend against environmental aggressors. Dedicated to enhancing the skin’s vitality and embracing natural beauty, we prioritize sustainable fermentation technologies to safeguard the skin’s fundamental health and nourish it from within.

identity.title: Better Life, BLMo
identity.description:
BLMo works differently from conventional hair loss medications such as finasteride. BLMo does not competitively inhibit the 5-alpha reductase enzyme.
BLMo inhibits the production of the enzyme itself, thereby reducing the amount of this enzyme in the cells. This approach is much safer and avoids the risks of side effects. Furthermore, BLMo effectively suppresses inflammatory substances caused by excessive DHT, thus preventing damage to hair follicle cells. BLMo addresses hair loss symptoms through improvements in vascular health, hair follicle health, and scalp health.

data.name: LAB FOR YOU
data.slogun: Trusted by Experts Loved by Skin

identity.title: Lab for You: Dermatology Skincare at Home
identity.description:
Lab for You is a premium homecare brand specifically developed for post-dermatological treatment care.
Our skincare solutions are designed to help soothe and protect skin after dermatological procedures, as well as address concerns such as sensitivity and irritation caused by external factors.

With a strong focus on professional-grade efficacy, Lab for You has earned the trust of experts across the country. Our products are used and recommended by dermatology clinics, aesthetic centers, and skincare professionals in over 200 locations across 35 cities, from Seoul to Jeju.

identity.title: Mild yet Effective!
identity.description:
Cosmetics don’t always have to sting to be effective. At Lab for You, we’re committed to creating skincare products that deliver maximum results without irritating the skin.

We focus on selecting the best ingredients, going through extensive sampling and testing to find the ideal combination. Each product undergoes a skin irritation test before launch, and its effectiveness is verified through clinical results. With this approach, we provide safe and trustworthy products that promote healthy, beautiful skin.

data.name: UNGSAM
data.slogun: We bring the greatness of Korean ginseng

identity.title: Surpassing the efficacy of Korean wild ginseng
identity.description:
In pure Korean, “Ung” means king. “Ungsam” is the sacred mountain where the king lives.
It has the meaning of a precious ginseng grown in “Ungsan” and offered to the king.

A leader must have big intentions and a strong spirit.
You must also have the power to contemplate like a deep green mountain.

Woongsam aims to give strength to leaders who enlighten the world on high thrones.
It is a premium vital ginseng with highly concentrated medicinal properties.

identity.title: Our products refuse to be compared to any others.
identity.description:
UNGSAM is cultivated in a next-generation smart farm that replicates the harsh natural conditions of wild mountain ginseng—strong winds, irregular sunlight, and nutrient-poor soil.

Unlike traditional ginseng, which is often grown in artificial environments with pesticides, UNGSAM is 100% MADE IN KOREA and produced by a certified manufacturer with patented technology and pesticide-free, bacteria-free environment. So its safe to eat whole of plant.(root to leaf)

By eliminating the drawbacks of both wild and farmed ginseng, UNGSAM maximizes only the benefits, redefining what ginseng can be.

identity.title: “Do not be deceived by marketing, Trust Science.”
identity.description:
“Well make sure you hear, Youve always had great skin, havent you?’.

Challans de Paris Inspired by the elegance of French luxury spas, Challans de Paris offers skincare solutions that enhance skin health and beauty. Each product reflects the sophistication, charm, and luxury of Paris, bringing a touch of French refinement to your daily routine.

identity.title: PREMIUM BOUTIQUES
identity.description:
Challans de Paris is distributed through premium channels and its own online boutique to maximize the value consumers experience at the moment of purchase.
It has been made available through Korea’s leading department stores such as Shinsegae, Lotte, Hyundai, and Galleria. Also showcases its value to global consumers through Korea’s top duty-free shops Shilla, Lotte, Hyundai, and Shinsegae offering an unparalleled shopping experience.
Additionally, it is offered through hotels and resorts such as Novotel, Hilton, and the renowned Ananti, delivering its unique value to consumers.

identity.title: Acne Terminator! Needle Shot TISHA
identity.description: TISHA is a derma-cosmetic brand. specialized in treating skin and scalp concerns using Micro Needle Shot technology. combined with 30 years of clinical expertise in Korean traditional medicine. We offer 7-day intensive care solutions for acne, pigmentation, melasma, and hair loss. Our patented ingredient Phytosilica ensures low-irritation and high-performance results. Backed by clinical research and safe formulations, TISHA is ideal for home self-care. We are currently exporting to 11 countries, aiming to expand into 50 global markets.
